channel.title: Secret hat not in room with the female assassins
channel.description:
Hi,
I just reached the part where I can find the purple hat, but it's no longer there.
Maybe the questions is asked already, but did the hat changed place?
I subscribed for the gnome first, then unsubscribed. Maybe this is causing the bug?
Thanks

item.title: Secret hat not in room with the female assassins
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Dragunov2:

… felt down!..

I C WUT U DID THAR

Read full topic

item.title: Secret hat not in room with the female assassins
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
Was a real pain in the ass to achieve this!

Especially Climbing up a ladder with the Hat, got sometimes stuck and felt down!

Also sprinting cannot be done while carrying the Hat!

Read full topic

item.title: Secret hat not in room with the female assassins
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Dragunov2:
danielsangeo:

For those that can’t find the hat and want to know where it is (thereby spoiling the achievement), PM me. I will tell you where it is and make fun of you as a bonus.

Old place was better and easier for us to drag it to the portal

“easier”

The achievement is supposed to be difficult to get.

Read full topic
